amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director of the FBI to personally approve any library or bookstore request for records by the FBI under section 215 of the PATRIOT Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in part B of House Report 109-178 to state that the Director of the FBI must personally approve any library or bookstore request for records by the FBI under section 215.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 402 - 26 (Roll no. 403).
